ComicInfo.Summary:
Wheels of Change Act 1: Stakeout: Simms and Vega are assigned to work with the DEA on a drug stakeout. When it seems that Vega's brother might be involved and in big trouble, the pair rush in with guns blazing.
Wheels of Change Act 2: Road Trip: Simms and Vega stop to help a girl who appears to have been in a bad car wreck but discover that she is crazy and has her sights set on shooting them both.
ComicInfo.Title: Wheels of Change Act 1: Stakeout; Wheels of Change Act 2: Road Trip
